                                     java.lang.String source,
                                     java.lang.String recipient)
                              throws ExceptionPopulation,

      • mergeAPercentageOfSourceIntoRecipient

        public void mergeAPercentageOfSourceIntoRecipient(ModelParameter generation,
                                                  java.lang.String source,
                                                  java.lang.String popA,
                                                  ModelParameter pdd)
                                           throws ExceptionPopulation
        Sent individuals to other pop in this generation (A single pulse admixture process). It does NOT switch off the other migrations from source to other pops, either updates the migration rate of popA (if it already exchanges migrants with source) or adds it
        Parameters:
        generation -
        source -
        popA -
        pdd - fraction of migrants that go to popA. Take this proportion of migrants from the proportion of migrants that admix in source
        Throws:
        ExceptionPopulation

      • mergeSourceIntoRecipients

        public void mergeSourceIntoRecipients(ModelParameter generation,
                                      java.lang.String source,
                                      java.lang.String popA,
                                      java.lang.String popB,
                                      ModelParameter pdd)
                               throws ExceptionPopulation
        Sent all the individuals to popA and B with probability pdd and 1-pdd respectively
        Parameters:
        generation -
        source -
        popA -
        popB -
        pdd - fraction of migrants that go to popA (1-popA goes to B)
        Throws:
        ExceptionPopulation

        public void resetEvents()
        Remove all the events of this list
